creditline: Gift of Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg for the Weisberg Collection of European Drawings and Prints of the Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Centuries
description: cover (recto) and first page (verso) of periodical; image on cover of standing man with a moustache and dark hair, wearing dark jacket, striped vest and pants, holding his cap in his PR hand and a newspaper in his PL hand, with a factory in the background; printed text at top; verso:  image of a newspaper boy in ULC and text
title: L'Honnête ouvrier (Honest Worker), cover for "La Feuille", no. 24 (recto)
